item.title: Analyzing the best show of all time: The Office
item.description: In this blogpost I will be analyzing a popular American show called The Office. The Office aired from March 2005 to May 2013. It has a total of 9 seasons and 201 shows and all streaming now on Netflix. A note to all hardcore office fan the entire library is going to leave the netflix platform in Jan 2021 and will make its debut on NBCâ€™s own streaming platform.
